html: When I got the news of Dr. Martin Luther King Jr.’s assassination 51 years ago today, I went home, numb. I sat in my house, turned the radio on and just listened. I just sat there, the rest of the night. The sun came up with me sitting there. #MLK51pic.twitter.com/RnYN6zsnlI
text:
When I got the news of Dr. Martin Luther King Jr.’s assassination 51 years ago today, I went home, numb. 

I sat in my house, turned the radio on and just listened. 

I just sat there, the rest of the night.

The sun came up with me sitting there. #MLK51pic.twitter.com/RnYN6zsnlI

html: We celebrate your birthday. We commemorate your death-day. And we quote your great words on the days in between. One day, I pray, we’ll authentically embrace the ideals and actions your great words were meant to inspire. I still believe and want to help us get there. I miss you.pic.twitter.com/1K8RllWjio
text: We celebrate your birthday. We commemorate your death-day. And we quote your great words on the days in between. html: Today marks one year since the death of my beloved constituent #SaheedVassell. At age 34, he was fatally shot by NYPD officers in #CrownHeights, who walked away from the incident scot-free. I stand with the Vassell's & our community as we demand justice. May he Rest in Power.
text:
Today marks one year since the death of my beloved constituent #SaheedVassell. At age 34, he was fatally shot by NYPD officers in #CrownHeights, who walked away from the incident scot-free. I stand with the Vassell's & our community as we demand justice.

May he Rest in Power.

html: I'm a proud co-sponsor of H.R. 9: the Climate Action Now Act, a bill that ensures America honors the Paris Agreement & commits to further action. Dems are proud to deliver on our promise to take bold action to confront the climate crisis, the existential threat of our time.

html: Growing your family shouldn’t mean putting your life at risk. The #MOMMAact will reduce the number of American moms dying from pregnancy & birth complications. This bill is crucial for Black women, who are 3-4x MORE likely to die in childbirth than their white counterparts.
text: Growing your family shouldn’t mean putting your life at risk. The #MOMMAact will reduce the number of American moms dying from pregnancy & birth complications. This bill is crucial for Black women, who are 3-4x MORE likely to die in childbirth than their white counterparts.

html: Hundreds of thousands of New Yorkers woke up to the sound of Bob Slade’s voice 6x a week. I have fond memories of joining him on “Open Line” throughout my career. I thank him for teaching us to be critical thinkers and truth-seekers, and for engaging our young people in politics.

html: I share the immense pain that Muslim communities across the globe are feeling after the cruel Islamophobic mosque attacks in Christchurch, NZ. I urge my fellow Americans to denounce hatred in all its forms. Sending my love and prayers to those in mourning. Enough is enough.
text:
I share the immense pain that Muslim communities across the globe are feeling after the cruel Islamophobic mosque attacks in Christchurch, NZ.

I urge my fellow Americans to denounce hatred in all its forms.

Sending my love and prayers to those in mourning. Enough is enough.

html: There are 25 Black women serving in Congress today & we all stand on the shoulders of the first Black woman to break this barrier, Shirley Chisholm. html: Women are equal and valued members of society, without exception. We will not, under any circumstances, allow our fundamental human rights to be cast aside. In honor of #IWD2019, I'm proud to co-sponsor #ReproRightsAreHumanRights Act to keep our rights front and center.
text: Women are equal and valued members of society, without exception. We will not, under any circumstances, allow our fundamental human rights to be cast aside. In honor of #IWD2019, I'm proud to co-sponsor #ReproRightsAreHumanRights Act to keep our rights front and center.

html: 54 years ago today, we were beaten, tear gassed, trampled by horses, and left bloody on that bridge in Selma. But we cannot rest. We cannot become weary. We must honor those who gave their lives for the right to vote. We must continue to find a way to get in the way. #goodtroublepic.twitter.com/Utygfx9hzc

html: Every woman has the right to live free from abuse. Today, we will act to authorize the #VAWA and introduce new steps to support survivors, such as empowering law enforcement, housing protections, and strengthening protections for Native American women.
text: Every woman has the right to live free from abuse. Today, we will act to authorize the #VAWA and introduce new steps to support survivors, such as empowering law enforcement, housing protections, and strengthening protections for Native American women.

html: It’s a no-brainer. The #ReproRightsAreHumanRights Act MUST be passed. Anyone who cares about human rights should be outraged at the @StateDept’s deletion of #reprorights from the annual Human Rights Reports. This bill is how we can put them back. That’s why I’m a co-sponsor.
text: It’s a no-brainer. The #ReproRightsAreHumanRights Act MUST be passed. Anyone who cares about human rights should be outraged at the @StateDept’s deletion of #reprorights from the annual Human Rights Reports. This bill is how we can put them back. That’s why I’m a co-sponsor.

html: Southeast Asian American & Pacific Islander women have some of the highest wage disparities. 58% of Asian American women and 63% of Native Hawaiian and Pacific Islander women are mothers with children under the age of 19. Our nation needs #AAPIEqualPay now.
text: Southeast Asian American & Pacific Islander women have some of the highest wage disparities. 58% of Asian American women and 63% of Native Hawaiian and Pacific Islander women are mothers with children under the age of 19. Our nation needs #AAPIEqualPay now.

html: As a Black woman, it's important to me that we stand with other woman of color in the fight for equal pay. The gender pay gap impacts all of our communities, so today, on #AAPIEqualPay Day, I'd like to acknowledge some of the starker wage disparities that AAPI women experience.
text: As a Black woman, it's important to me that we stand with other woman of color in the fight for equal pay. The gender pay gap impacts all of our communities, so today, on #AAPIEqualPay Day, I'd like to acknowledge some of the starker wage disparities that AAPI women experience.

html: Tomorrow we're filing a national lawsuit with 20 other AGs against the Trump Admin’s new Title X “#GagRule,” which will hurt millions of Americans by denying access to health care & family planning services. We won't stand for attacks on our rights & access to health care.pic.twitter.com/5MD1abQYRx
text:
Tomorrow we're filing a national lawsuit with 20 other AGs against the Trump Admin’s new Title X “#GagRule,” which will hurt millions of Americans by denying access to health care & family planning services.
 
We won't stand for attacks on our rights & access to health care.pic.twitter.com/5MD1abQYRx

html: I’m deeply appalled that a car in Crown Heights was vandalized with a swatstika. I stand with @ChaimDeutsch & friends to denounce bias, racism, & anti-Semitism. html: They were children. It was unspeakable. And then our leaders did nothing—so we all stood up. Today marks 6 years since the tragedy at Sandy Hook Elementary. No matter how many years pass, my heart breaks. No matter how many years pass, my life will remain devoted to this cause.pic.twitter.com/E7qGT5uGc6
text:
They were children. It was unspeakable. And then our leaders did nothing—so we all stood up.

html: @UndocuBlack_Pat shares tips for families: 1. Do not discontinue your children’s benefits, they are not affected by your public charge status. 2. If you’re out of the U.S. for more than 6 months at once you can be subject to the public charge test again. #publiccharge – at Lenox Road Baptist Church
text:
@UndocuBlack_Pat shares tips for families: 

1. Do not discontinue your children’s benefits, they are not affected by your public charge status.  

2. If you’re out of the U.S. for more than 6 months at once you can be subject to the public charge test again.

#publiccharge – at Lenox Road Baptist Church

html: President Trump just removed Jeff Sessions. He wants an Attorney General to serve his interest, not the public. Mueller's investigation and the independence of the DOJ must be protected. Whitaker and any nominee must commit to doing both. We will protect the rule of law.
text:
President Trump just removed Jeff Sessions. He wants an Attorney General to serve his interest, not the public.

Mueller's investigation and the independence of the DOJ must be protected. Whitaker and any nominee must commit to doing both.
 
We will protect the rule of law.

html: In Congress, we are committed to emergency preparedness across the nation. Because of climate change and upticks in natural disasters and mass shootings, we must be more vigilant than ever to protect ourselves and our families.
text: In Congress, we are committed to emergency preparedness across the nation. Because of climate change and upticks in natural disasters and mass shootings, we must be more vigilant than ever to protect ourselves and our families.

html: Historic buildings in our district, though beautiful have not been updated to fit the needs of families today. Those buildings are more susceptible to disasters due to things like poor ventilation and lack of emergency access points. We’re learning how to combat these issues.pic.twitter.com/PmzZPMW8OU

html: I signed a letter to ICE Acting Dir. Vitiello on telephone access policies for parents who are detained & separated from their children. Parents are being charged $8/minute to talk with their children. I strongly believe no parents should be charged to speak with their children.
text: I signed a letter to ICE Acting Dir. Vitiello on telephone access policies for parents who are detained & separated from their children. Parents are being charged $8/minute to talk with their children. I strongly believe no parents should be charged to speak with their children.

html: My constituents are concerned about #NetNeutrality and their privacy protections as consumers. I am too. I questioned the @FTC on this issue, and also asked for a concrete plan going forward to protect consumer privacy.
text: My constituents are concerned about #NetNeutrality and their privacy protections as consumers. I am too. I questioned the @FTC on this issue, and also asked for a concrete plan going forward to protect consumer privacy.

html: Today, I asked @FTC Commissioner @chopraftc about the impact that the lack of meaningful privacy protections has on consumers in low-income communities and if the FTC has the resources to protect them. Privacy protections are crucial, and all communities must have access to them.
text:
Today, I asked @FTC Commissioner @chopraftc about the impact that the lack of meaningful privacy protections has on consumers in low-income communities
and if the FTC has the resources to protect them. Privacy protections are crucial, and all communities must have access to them.

html: #OTD in 1865, enslaved African Americans were notified of their freedom by Union troops in Galveston Bay, TX. html: The financial crisis hit minorities the hardest. Now, #S2155 would exempt 85% of depository institutions from reporting critical data that can be used to identify lending discrimination against African Americans, Latinos and other minority groups.pic.twitter.com/15PDOQjz2n

html: I voted "NO" on #S2155. It will weaken key #DoddFrank reforms & rolls back critical consumer protections put in place following the financial crisis, including mortgage rules & data reporting requirements in place to prevent discriminatory lending. #DoddFrankRollBack
text: I voted "NO" on #S2155. It will weaken key #DoddFrank reforms & rolls back critical consumer protections put in place following the financial crisis, including mortgage rules & data reporting requirements in place to prevent discriminatory lending. #DoddFrankRollBack

html: Last week, I signed a petition to force a vote on legislation to restore #NetNeutrality. The fight for a free and open internet continues.pic.twitter.com/nkn6LaYJUx
